strings.Value: "Your Grace, Lady Jamandi sent {g|JamandiExcuses}an answer{/g} to your hasty message. Luckily, the Swordlord took your quick temper into account, and decided to resolve the situation peacefully. Furthermore, a caravan has come from {g|Restov}Restov{/g}, carrying resources for the barony! I hope now you will be able to appreciate the generosity of the Aldori!"

"Your Grace, {g|JamandiExcuses}a letter{/g} from Jamandi Aldori arrived. It seems the {g|Swordlords}Swordlords{/g} have their tails between their legs: they sent a whole caravan of valuable goods along with the letter. Jamandi Aldori must be in a perilous situation, if she's inducing Your Grace with gifts. Here, take the letter."

"You won't believe it, Your Grace! Today a caravan entered the city, filled with generous gifts from {g|Restov}Restov{/g}! I wonder who could have sent it. Maybe a certain lady was impressed by our determination? Bravo, Your Grace — I salute your {d|c31 Jamandi Chaotic}aggressive diplomacy{/d} skills! Here, see for yourself — it's {g|JamandiExcuses}a letter{/g} from Jamandi Aldori!"
